extends IFunction
    WakeUp Function interface

      void configWakeUp(java.lang.String filePath)
      Set up wake up resources, wake up resources to http://yuyin.baidu.com/wake#m4 to evaluate and export.

      • configWakeUp

        void configWakeUp(java.lang.String filePath)
        Set up wake up resources, wake up resources to http://yuyin.baidu.com/wake#m4 to evaluate and export. The resource is begging to take effect after called start method.
        Parameters:
        filePath - wake up resources file's path.
